4302480.name: Calon Arang Nightmare of Revenge
4302480.description:
Inspired by the Indonesian legend of Calon Arang, this is a narrative-driven horror game focused on exploration, atmosphere, and psychological tension.

You will explore cursed locations tied to an ancient dark ritual, uncover fragmented stories, and face supernatural threats that react to your presence. The horror is not only delivered through jump scares, but through environmental storytelling, traps, and relentless enemies that hunt you as the truth unfolds.

This game is developed by a solo developer, with a strong focus on mood, pacing, and immersive world design.

Gameplay Features

  • Narrative Exploration
    Uncover the story through environments, notes, and unsettling events rather than direct exposition.

  • Psychological Horror Atmosphere
    Slow-burn tension mixed with sudden jump scares to keep players constantly on edge.

  • Traps & Enemy Encounters
    Dangerous traps and hostile entities designed to pressure players during exploration.

  • Legend-Based Horror
    Inspired by the dark myth of Calon Arang, blending folklore elements with original interpretation.
